snippet: Supporters of California’s ban on same-sex marriage asked the United States Supreme Court on Tuesday to reverse a federal appeals court decision striking down the measure as unconstitutional.
abstract: Supporters of California’s ban on same-sex marriage ask United States Supreme Court to reverse a federal appeals court decision striking down the measure as unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: Supporters of California’s ban on same-sex marriage asked the United States Supreme Court on Tuesday to reverse a federal appeals court decision striking down the measure as unconstitutional.

headline.main: California: Justices Are Asked to Rule on Marriage Ban
headline.print_headline: California: Justices Are Asked To Rule On Marriage Ban
